user_stories.title: Drop EOL Node 18 support
user_stories.i_want: to stop supporting Node 18 which reached EOL in April 2025
user_stories.so_that: we don't give users a false sense of security by testing against an unsupported runtime

user_stories.title: Add Node 24 LTS to test matrix
user_stories.i_want: the framework to be tested against Node 24
user_stories.so_that: I can confidently use the framework on the current Active LTS

user_stories.title: Consistent version references
user_stories.i_want: all Node version references to be consistent across the project
user_stories.so_that: there is no confusion about which Node versions are supported

user_stories.title: API compatibility validation
user_stories.i_want: to verify no Node 18-specific APIs are used in the codebase
user_stories.so_that: dropping Node 18 does not introduce runtime errors
